name: Vereniging Nederlands Kalkzandsteenplatform
goal: De belangenbehartiging van de Nederlandse kalkzandsteenindustrie en haar toeleveranciers in nationaal en internationaal verband m.n. t.a.v. Milieu, arbo, veiligheid en kwaliteit.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Normalisatie
CPR
Energy tax
Circulair economy
Environment

VNK richt zich op milieu, arbo, veiligheid en kwaliteit.
